Matroska (BCB)

Download

  • Download http://dl.matroska.org/downloads/libmatroska/libmatroska-0.7.7.tar.bz2

Project

  • Create new project (Library)
  • Add (%SOURCE_HOME%/src/): All .cpp files

Project Options

  • Compiler : Release
  • Directories, include : add %SOURCE_HOME%/
  • Directories, include : add Include/ (or your include directory with ebml includes)
  • Directories, Conditional : WIN32;_WIN32

Compile

  • Ctrl+F9

Install

  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/Matroska to Shared/Include/Matroska
  • Copy %Your_Project_Name%.lib to Shared/Library/BCB/Matroska.lib
